title: Caramelized Tofu With Brussels Sprouts
summary: Caramelized Tofu With Brussels Sprouts is a gluten free and vegan recipe with 4 servings. One serving contains 200 calories, 6g of protein, and 14g of fat. For $1.18 per serving, this recipe covers 14% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe from mynewroots.blogspot.com has 1 fans. Not a lot of people really liked this side dish. If you have brussels sprouts, pecans, olive oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 79%. This score is solid. Try Dinner Tonight: Caramelized Tofu with Brussels Sprouts, Caramelized Brussels Sprouts, and Brussels Sprouts And Tofu for similar recipes.
